segments.text: Hi , John , this is Mary , your tenant up in Lincoln Park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi , Mary , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was wondering when trash collection day was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s on Tuesdays and Fridays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could save a couple of dollars by taking it to the dump yourself , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , o . k . Where ’ s that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s at the corner of that street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Who do I call for trash collection ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just leave the stuff by the curb . The company ’ ll send a guy out next month to give you the bill .
segments.speaker: S2
